airframe.name: pt_ant
airframe.makefile:
tunnel.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI) tunnel.ARCH = arm7tdmi tunnel.TARGET = tunnel tunnel.TARGETDIR = tunnel
tunnel.CFLAGS += -DFBW -DCONFIG=\"conf_demo.h\" -DLED -DTIME_LED=1 tunnel.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_tunnel.c
ARCHI=arm7
FLASH_MODE = IAP
main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI) main.ARCH = arm7tdmi main.TARGET = main main.TARGETDIR = main
main.CFLAGS += -DCONFIG=\"conf_demo.h\" main.srcs = main_pan_tilt_antenna.c
main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='SYS_TICS_OF_SEC(1e-1)' main.srcs += sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DLED
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0 main.srcs += downlink.c pprz_transport.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDATALINK=PPRZ -DPPRZ_UART=Uart0 main.srcs += pt_ant_datalink.c
main.srcs += pt_ant_motors.c
main.CFLAGS += -I2C_BUF_LEN=32 main.srcs += pt_ant_sensors.c AMI601.c i2c.c $(SRC_ARCH)/i2c_hw.c
main.srcs += pt_ant_estimator.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART1 -DUART1_BAUD=B9600 #main.CFLAGS += -DGPS -DUBX -DGPS_LINK=Uart1 #main.CFLAGS += -DGPS_USER_CALLBACK=pt_ant_estimator_update_self_gps -DGPS_USER_CALLBACK_HEADER=\"pt_ant_estimator.h\" #main.CFLAGS += -DGPS_CONFIGURE -DGPS_BAUD=38400 #main.srcs += gps_ubx.c gps.c
